Title: Establishes a speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Mount Kisco
Summary: Establishes a speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Mount Kisco; repeals authorization of program December 31, 2030.
LawCode: Add ยง1180-h, V & T L; amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public officers law, in relation to establishing a speed zone camera demonstration program in the village of Mount Kisco; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
